sqlMap.sql:
from p_gjbm gjbm, (SELECT VALUE BM, NAME MC FROM P_CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'gjlb' AND LANG = 'en_US') gjlb, (SELECT VALUE BM, NAME MC FROM P_CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'gjdj' AND LANG = 'en_US') gjdj, (SELECT VALUE BM, NAME MC FROM P_CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'zdgylx' AND LANG = 'en_US') gylx, (SELECT VALUE BM, NAME MC FROM P_CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'dlyy' AND LANG = 'ALL') dlyy where gjlb.bm = gjbm.gjlb and gjdj.bm = gjbm.gjdj and dlyy.bm = gjbm.lang and gylx.bm = gjbm.gylx
and gjbm.gylx=#gylx#
and gjbm.lang=#yy#
and gjbm.gjlb=#gjlb#
and gjbm.gjmc like CONCAT('%' , #gjmc# , '%')
and gjbm.gjbm like CONCAT('%' , #gjbm# , '%')
order by gjbm.gjdj asc
sqlMap.select: select gjbm.gjbm, gjbm.gjmc, gjbm.gylx, gylx.mc as gylxmc, gjbm.gjlb, gjlb.mc as gjlbmc, gjbm.gjdj, gjdj.mc as gjdjmc, gjbm.lang, dlyy.mc as yy
select gjbm,gjmc,gylx,gjlb,gjdj,lang as yy from p_gjbm where gjbm=#gjbm# and lang=#lang#
sqlMap.update: update p_gjbm set gjmc=#gjmc#,gylx=#gylx#,gjlb=#gjlb#,gjdj=#gjdj# where gjbm=#gjbm# and lang=#lang#
sqlMap.delete: delete from p_gjbm where gjbm=#gjbm# and lang=#lang#
